name: Power Cube
description:
The thing.

Power Cube is a 3-D puzzle platformer game where you play as a cube of energy and your trail powers objects in the world.

Credit

This was a solo project by Phatho Pukwana

Useful Info

The game uses mouse and keyboard inputs, however a gamepad can be used for movement.

  • WASD/Arrow Keys/ Left Stick - Movement
  • Space - Activates power-up (the pink cage around the character)
  • H - Toggles the controls on and off.
